name: Allure
description: Faes are naturally alluring. Unfortunately, this means that mobs will pursue them from far further away than they would other creatures.

entity_action.command: execute as @e[type=!minecraft:player,type=!minecraft:wither,type=!minecraft:ender_dragon,type=!minecraft:zombie] run attribute @s minecraft:generic.follow_range base set 64.0

entity_action_chosen.command: execute as @e[type=!minecraft:player,type=!minecraft:wither,type=!minecraft:ender_dragon,type=!minecraft:zombie] run attribute @s minecraft:generic.follow_range base set 64.0

entity_action_lost.command: execute as @e[type=!minecraft:player,type=!minecraft:wither,type=!minecraft:ender_dragon,type=!minecraft:zombie] run attribute @s minecraft:generic.follow_range base set 32.0

entity_action.command: execute as @e[type=minecraft:zombie] run attribute @s minecraft:generic.follow_range base set 112.0

entity_action_chosen.command: execute as @e[type=minecraft:zombie] run attribute @s minecraft:generic.follow_range base set 112.0

entity_action_lost.command: execute as @e[type=minecraft:zombie] run attribute @s minecraft:generic.follow_range base set 80.0
